issue.title: How can i connect cpp files to srcsim simulation?

content.raw:
You will connect your cpp files to srcsim using ROS messages.  Your cpp files will send and receive ROS messages that control Valkyrie and get data from Valkyrie respectively.

I would recommend going through the tutorials (to at least number 11) at: http://wiki.ros.org/ROS/Tutorials
They don't take too long and will be well worth your time.  The tutorials talk about ROS messages, how to build your code and include information about CMakeLists.txt
content.html:
You will connect your cpp files to srcsim using ROS messages. Your cpp files will send and receive ROS messages that control Valkyrie and get data from Valkyrie respectively.

I would recommend going through the tutorials (to at least number 11) at: http://wiki.ros.org/ROS/Tutorials They don't take too long and will be well worth your time. The tutorials talk about ROS messages, how to build your code and include information about CMakeLists.txt
